How a mendicant is beautiful [an3.98:4.4: Conducting themselves well and seeking alms in suitable places
Seeing danger in the slightest fault
How a mendicant is strong (a causal sequ: Living with energy roused up for giving up unskillful qualities
Not slacking off when it comes to developing skillful qualities
How a mendicant is fast (a causal sequen: Realizing the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life
Living having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
